Conjuration 5

Send Bukavac

EA Rus,  MA Vanarus,  LA Bogarus

Ritual
W4
spell id [id]: 245
effect number [effect_number]: 38
damage [damage]: 1948
spec [spec]: 8388608

number of effects [nreff]: 1

Remote Summon (Temporary units):#1948 Bukavac
Destination Terrain : Sea
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster summons and sends a Bukavac to a wreak havoc in a distant sea province. This ritual can be cast on land. The Bukavac is a huge and horrible water being with a frightening call and six tentacle-like legs. It lives in the murky lakes of Rus, but is known to wreak havoc in coastal seas, perhaps guided by malign magic.
